channel.title: iam on Cloudy Caffeine with Ana
channel.description: Recent content in iam on Cloudy Caffeine with Ana

item.title: AWS: Handling 'Cannot delete entity, must remove tokens from principal first' error
item.description: This blog post will be a quick one focusing on troubleshooting a less clear error, ‘Cannot delete entity, must remove tokens from principal first’, that Terraform can throw when you try to delete IAM users from AWS. Let’s assume that in your Terraform configuration you manage IAM users and you want to delete one of them. You’d think that by simply removing the Terraform code and then running terraform apply it will delete the users.
